title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk and linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in long armed cross, satin, overcasting variation, and withdrawn elements with needlemade fillings (reticella) on plain weave foundation
description: Part of an unfinished white work sampler.  Bands of pattern: open work followed by solid all white.  At bottom alphabet in red and green.
name: Sampler
